sql.query:
INSERT INTO enrolments
(enrolmentType, dropDate, isValid, student_uuid, startDate, class_uuid, dropReason, isTransferIn, isTransferOut, priceOverride, priceOverrideValue, priceOverrideType) VALUES (:P1 /* {{dummyenrol.enrolmentType}} */, :P2 /* {{dummyenrol.dropDate}} */, '1', :P3 /* {{dummyenrol.student_uuid}} */, :P4 /* {{dummyenrol.startDate}} */, :P5 /* {{dummyenrol.class_uuid}} */, :P6 /* {{''}} */, '0', '0', '0', '0', '0')

SELECT enrolmentTypes.type AS enrolmentType, days.dayname, c.startTimeDisplay, classLevels.name AS class_level, staff.firstName AS instructor_first, staff.lastName AS instructor_last, e.startDate, e.dropDate, e.uuid
FROM enrolments AS e
LEFT JOIN classes AS c ON (c.uuid = e.class_uuid) LEFT JOIN days ON (days.id = c.day) LEFT JOIN staff ON (staff.uuid = c.instructor_uuid) LEFT JOIN classLevels ON (classLevels.uuid = c.classlevel_uuid) LEFT JOIN enrolmentTypes ON (enrolmentTypes.id = e.enrolmentType)
WHERE e.id = :P1 /* {{insert_new_enrolment.identity}} */

SELECT type
FROM enrolmentTypes
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{dummyenrol.enrolmentType}} */

SELECT *
FROM makeup_tokens
WHERE status = 'active' AND expiry_date >= :P1 /* {{TIMESTAMP}} */ AND student_uuid = :P2 /* {{dummyenrol.student_uuid}} */

UPDATE makeup_tokens
SET enrolment_uuid = :P1 /* {{query_new_enrolment.uuid}} */, updated_date = :P2 /* {{TIMESTAMP}} */, updated_by = :P3 /* {{identity}} */, status = 'used'
WHERE uuid = :P4 /* {{query_latest_makeup_token.uuid}} */
